availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Richard G. Mathews (Kenton County, Kentucky, lumber dealer)

body.p: Kenton County, Kentucky, lumber dealer. New York native. Married to Permelia Mathews. Father of Ella Mathews. Lumber dealer in Covington in 1860. Employed Ann Groger as a servant in 1860. Lumber dealer in Kenton County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington Ward 5, p. 761.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington Ward 5, p. 143A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Kentucky, 6th Congressional District, Vol. 3, June and July 1863, p. 150, p. 301 of microfilm, (Accessed via ancestry.com on April 3, 2020).
